dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Miguel, mabilis ang oras kanina. Ano tingin mo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi nagtutugma ang mga piraso. May nagsusulat ng istorya na hindi totoo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Balikan natin ang standards: presumption of innocence (1987 Const. Art. III, Sec. 14(2)) at due process (Sec. 1).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Oo. At burden ng prosecution (Rule 133). Kailangan ng solidong ebidensya (Rule 130).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: May hawak tayong broken body cam. Ibigay natin for potential recovery ng footage.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Maganda. Pwedeng maglabas 'yan ng timeline at accountability.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: I-forward natin sa tamang unit. Chain of custody, ha. Huwag papabayaan.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Sige. Kasunod nito, preliminary investigation (Rule 112) kung kinakailangan, at ihanda ang mga pleading kung aabot (Rule 110).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: At sa lahat ng ito â€” CPRA (2023). Walang bias, walang shortcut.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Tama. Katotohanan ang target. Simulan natin agad.
